list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a deep-bodied freshwater fish, typically with barbels around the mouth. Carp are farmed for food in some parts of the world and are widely kept in large ponds.
complain or find fault continually about trivial matters.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: I don't want to carp about the way you did it
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Tôi không muốn cá chép về cách bạn đã làm nó
